segments.text: I can't help but feel anxious watching the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches his hand toward the cookie jar, completely focused on his goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The unstable stool looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but the moment feels too delicate for that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below him, her hand raised in anticipation, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about the mess this will create if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The carefree mischief of children often comes with such risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
